content:
RetryBehavior Class

Definition

Defines the retry behavior to use for detecting transient errors.

In this Article

public sealed class RetryBehavior
Inheritance
Object
RetryBehavior

Constructors

RetryBehavior(Func<Exception,Boolean>)

Initializes an instance of the RetryBehavior class

Properties

DefaultRetryBehavior

Gets the default retry behavior.
